interface.name: _Component
interface.desc: A component that extends preact.Component to set default properties. https://git.io/fjHoZ
interface.prop: The properties that will be assigned on the component by _Preact_ when constructing it.

types.constructor:
The string of the DOM node to create or Component constructor to render.
<prop name="children" type="!Array"> The children of node.
The key used to identify this VNode in a list.
The properties of this VNode.
